subject: Freestyle Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Ted Ligety, who jumped to the top of the men’s World Cup standings by winning his third consecutive giant slalom, is now focused on being the best overall skier on the men’s circuit.
snippet: Ted Ligety, who jumped to the top of the men’s World Cup standings by winning his third consecutive giant slalom, is now focused on being the best overall skier on the men’s circuit.
